roleset.name: to designate for a specified use

example.name: passive
example.text: `` Never Too Young '' is a different sort of work , [*-1] focusing on the 1986 death from cocaine ingestion of Bias , [a University of Maryland basketball star]-1 ticketed [*]-1 for sure pro stardom .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ticket' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
